case.state: Dream time!
Dreamcatcher present!
Ready to rock!
OMG, I am like so ready to go!
Nighty night, ~player~... Oh? It's day out? Is it really, or are you totally just dreaming right now?
Nighty night, ~player~...
OMG, Cortex? Is that you? Er, partly you? I sure hope your geeky Tech abilities can get you back to normal!
Ugh, Kaos? I totally didn't sign up to be in your dream. Byeeee!
Hi hi! My name's Dreamcatcher! After this match is over, you won't be able to get me out of your heads! Ah haha ha!
Just one, please and thank you!
I wouldn't dream of messing up this hand!
Dream up ~cards.text~ new cards for me.
These ~cards.text~ are so last round! You can have them back!
I'm sending these ~cards.text~ to card jail. Good luck getting out!
I couldn't have dreamt of a better hand myself!
Not even Traptanium can cut through this hand -- and Traptanium is, like, super strong!
Looks like my hand is made out of pure Cardtanium! Ah haha!
Hope you've got something better than a pair, Portal Master! I think you're gonna need it!
A pair won't exactly blow anyone away. At least, not like I will if I lose -- that's not a threat, BTW, that's a promise.
With a body like this, I've got no reason to sweat bad hands!
Maybe if I read the cards again, this hand will get better...? Nope! Well, it was worth a shot!
Any chance you're willing to summon me a new hand, Portal Master? Don't answer that, I know you want to see me lose! Aha ha!
Ahaha! JK, I know you're not the real Kaos! But you totally are a Portal Master. Don't worry about sending your Skylanders after me, though, I'm only here to have a little fun!
Don't think I don't know who you are, ~player~. You are so totally a Portal Master! Well I plan on being a good girl while I'm here, so don't worry about sending any Skylanders after me.

I hope you weren't expecting me to not know you're a Portal Master, ~player~. Let's make a deal: I won't tell anyone about the kinds of dreams you have if you don't send any Skylanders after me. Sound good?
It's not my thing, either. I see people cry and scream in their dreams all the time, they're total turn-offs. But when someone wants you as much as you want them? So hot!
Well... I am pretty bummed I didn't get to become a SuperCharger. It's not like I would've been the only villain racer, either. Even Glumshanks got to race, and he's, well, Glumshanks.
I once pushed an entire village to the point of insanity just for the thrill!
Ah, I'm getting ahead of myself! My name's Dreamcatcher! Nice to meet you!
My name's Dreamcatcher, BTW. Nice to meet you!
Normally I'd be reading your mind right now, ~player~, but Portal Masters are different. I can totally guess your secrets based on what you dream, though!
Count yourself lucky that I can't read your mind, ~player~. There's something about Portal Masters that makes them unreadable. I'll have to think up some other way of finding your secrets...
I would so totally be reading your mind right now if you weren't a Portal Master, ~player~. I'm sure there must be some other way I can learn your secrets, though...
You must be into Air Skylanders, huh, Portal Master? I'm Air element too, if you didn't know, so I feel right at home.
You must be into Air Skylanders, huh, Portal Master? I just hope you don't have any Air Traps on you. You don't have to cram me into a dusty old crystal to get me to do what you want, you know~...
Geez, are your dreams always this weird, ~player~?
You sure do have some weird dreams, ~player~. Like, seriously, OMG!
OMG, if this is your wet dream, ~player~, then you are so kinky!
This has got to be the weirdest dream I've ever been in. You deserve, like, a medal or something!
Would you believe me if I said Kaos's dreams are just like this? Well you shouldn't! As if I'd ever visit that dork's dreams!
TBH I've learned enough about you just from these opponents! I could head home happy!
You're into blue hair, huh, Portal Master? Good taste!
It's nice to see I'm not the only one here with blue hair. I wonder if I'm the only one whose carpet matches her drapes, though...
You're into blondes, huh, ~player~? I mean, really, who isn't? I'd go blonde myself if I didn't already look fabulous with blue hair.
A fan of golden locks, huh, Portal Master? I know someone with really golden hair I can set you up with...
Hmm, maybe I should've dreamed myself a taller body... Oh well, you'll just have to love me as I am!
You're into Giants, huh, Portal Master? I can't say you've got bad taste. I mean Ninjini is a total babe.
Gee, I wonder what your favorite element is, Portal Master. Could it be, oh I dunno, Undead?
OMG, Wolfgang much, Portal Master? With all these undead people here, I can practically hear Wolfgang's evil music right now!
Something tells me you've got a lot of Undead and Dark Skylanders in your summoning pool, am I right, Portal Master?
Goth is a good look. Those Undead and Dark Skylanders just have it going on, don't they, ~player~?
OMG, with all these villains here, it's almost like we're re-forming the Doom Raiders! I would never let that happen without my gal-pal Golden Queen, though!

Let me guess, you're one of those Portal Masters that sticks with Magic Skylanders 'cause you're a big Spyro fan, huh? You should totally give the other Elements a try sometime. There are other dragons, you know.
You must like Magic Skylanders, huh, Portal Master? Hey, do you have Wrecking Ball in your summoning pool? He's so totally cute!
You're totally into colorful hair, aren't you, ~player~? Or maybe it's something you don't even think about?
You like big butts, huh, Portal Master? Well, at least you can't lie! Hey, have you ever seen the butt on Head Rush? I wonder if her helmet has anything to do with it? Y'know, lifting it and stuff?
Totally into vampires, huh, Portal Master? Tell me, who's hotter, Bat Spin or Roller Brawl?
So, you like a hairy downstairs, huh, ~player~? And if you haven't figured out how I already know they're hairy, maybe I'll just leave it a secret~...
Elves, huh? Say, have you ever met Stealth Elf, Portal Master? You probably have. She's super popular, and real cute without her mask, too.
You're into Minis, huh? Well, as long as you're into the video game Minis and not the comic Minis!
You're totally into red-heads, huh? I tried out that look once, but it wasn't for me.
Ah, sorry, the rest of you must be wondering what a Portal Master is, huh? They're powerful mages who can use Portals of Power to summon things! They're, like, super cool!

Oh, right, the rest of you probably don't know what a Portal Master is, huh? They're powerful mages, and the only ones who can use Portals of Power to summon things! ~player~ is probably why we're all here!
Say, ~player~, do you have any Rift Engine vehicles in your summoning pool? Can I take one for a spin?
Blaster-Tron totally got off the easiest of the ex-villain Senseis. He literally had a "good/evil" switch, so all they had to do was flip it to "good!"
BTW, don't worry about me stealing your clothes. It's not like I know someone who'd buy them!
I may not look like the type, but I've actually been in prison -- twice. Don't worry, it was only for a teensie bit of theft and mischief. Your not, like, in danger or anything.
I'm not mad about being passed up for becoming a Sensei. I'm, like, totally not that much of a fighter. I am bummed about being left out of the racing, though...

My gal-pal Golden Queen was super commited to becoming a Sensei. She spent, like, two years reorganizing the books in Skylanders Academy's library. I could never spend that long dealing with musky old books!
Can you believe Mags is actually Undead, not Tech? I mean really, she's always tinkering, she's got that staff, her name is Mags, how is she not Tech?
Better read your cards carefully! Text in dreams is, like, always changing, so if you're not careful, your good hand might turn bad on you!
Do you ever think about where Trigger Happy gets all those coins he shoots from? There's, like, no way he just has all that money. He's got to be making them magically or something!
You know, if Pop Fizz's potions didn't have such crazy effects to them, I'd totally drink one. He says they taste "soda-licious," how can I not want a sip?
Isn't it just super funny that Stealth Elf took up a machine gun when she was a SuperCharger? Like, how do you go from stealth to literally the loudest weapon out there?
Isn't it totally weird that the inside of a Traptanium Crystal smells like mustard? I'm not even kidding! You need, like, a super good nose to smell it, though!
Have you ever had some of the candy that Pain-Yatta fights with? It's super tasty! If you see him you should totally ask for some -- or just, like, annoy him until he spits some at you!
Did you know that Dr. Krankcase made himself wooden legs 'cause he just misplaced his real legs? Like, how does that even work? He's not even a robot!
Don't you think it's weird that Blaster-Tron is Light element? Like, how is a robot anything other than Tech? Do you think it's because of his lasers?
You're lucky we're not playing strip Skystones Smash. I'm, like, basically unbeatable!
Isn't it funny that Cortex is a Sorcerer class Sensei and Chompy Mage is a Bazooker? Like, it's not just me who thinks they should've traded classes, right?
Isn't it interesting how one person's dream can be someone else's nightmare? Like, most people would hate to dream about spiders, but someone who likes spiders would get a kick out of it!
Don't forget, sleep is very important! Go too long without sleeping and you might start seeing things!

Are you wondering, like, just what exactly I am? Well stop wondering, I'll just tell you! I'm a being from the Realm of Dreams. I can totally visit people in their dreams, and I can manipulate dreams too!
BTW, in case you were wondering, I'm a being from the Realm of Dreams. Traveling through and manipulating dreams is more natural to me than walking!
So, be honest, what do you dress like when you're sleeping? I'm not afraid to admit that I sleep naked.
Wouldn't it be, like, totally cool to be a Giant for a day? I've never been very strong, so I'd love to be all big and strong like them and stomp some Chompies!
Wouldn't it be, like, totally cool to be a Giant for a day? I'd love to be able to use physical strength to throw rocks at some bad guys!

Hey, what's the spiciest thing you've ever eaten? I once had some of Grill-X's cooking, and that hot ketchup he uses was so spicy, I legit thought my braces were gonna melt! I'm never gonna trust a robot's sense of taste ever again after that!
Got a bad hand, ~other~? It's written all over your mind!
Looks like you shouldn't have changed out that one card, ~other~. Too bad!
It's a good thing we're not playing regular poker, 'cause your poker mind is super bad, ~other~!
Aw, too bad, looks like ~other~ won't be losing this time -- just wait 'til you see that hand!
Hey, while I'm in your head, ~other~, I should totally learn your poker secrets too! Like, how do you even get a hand like that?
Do you think you're safe with that pair you've got, ~other~? Don't answer that! Your thoughts on that hand are how I know it's a pair in the first place!
None yet -- reading minds takes time. But I'm sure I'll get there before the end of this match!
It varies from dreamer to dreamer. Some people have super boring dreams most nights, but some people are, like, always dreaming of fun stuff!
You totally should be impressed. Lucid Lockdown is super hard to get out of -- the guards there all have dream powers just like mine.

As powerful as I may be, the Skylanders have, like, no problem beating me in battle, so I'd just end up back in Cloudcracker Prison. FYI, I never escaped Cloudcracker, I was set free by someone on the outside.
Are you using your powers to cheat, Portal Master? How evil! I love it!
What do you think, Portal Master, should I make my clothes disappear again, or should I be a bit slower~?
Prepare to be blown away -- by my body, not my winds!
You wouldn't dream of skipping me, would you?
Hmm, I think now would be a great time to take off my bow... As if! My bow is totally too adorable to take off!
If you think my bow will be first, you have no idea just how much I love my bow. It's just so me.
That also depends on the dreamer. I see a lot of everything, so it's all normal to me.
They're totally not useless. I can make dreams reality, whether it's your worst nightmare or your greatest wet dream. For example: my clothes. They weren't real this whole time.
Cloudcracker is totally different. They put you inside these magic crystals that trap you in, like, a prison void or something. The only way to get out is to be let out.

I know your full name's "Ibuki Akiyama," you took the name "Critical Darling" from a Slipknot song, you're probably going to have instant ramen for dinner, and you're totally worried we're gonna think you're too hairy.
I'm playing nice here, so you're getting shoes and socks. You're welcome.
I'm not exactly here to win, so I won't drag things out.
Try not to fall asleep on me. I'll eat your dreams if you do.
This shirt's too stuffy. I'm used to a more... breezy wardrobe.
It's not like I conjured these clothes to not un-conjure them.
I hope you like polkadot panties! I wore a matching set of underwear, of course!
It's probably not such a good idea for an Air element person like me to wear a skirt, but I don't mind if someone catches a peak underneath~...
I don't have, like, the science to back it up, but I'm totally sure it's better to sleep without a bra.
I feel a lot more "me" when I'm not wearing anything... but the bow is staying. It's just too cute.
Where I come from, it's totally okay to go around completely naked. It is the Realm of Dreams, after all -- no one cares what you do in a dream!
Yep! But don't worry, there are ways to get me to stop snooping~!
If you have to think about it, boring is probably your normal. You'd remember if they're normally weird!
Exactly! So you can see how escaping a prison guarded by people who have that power too wouldn't be easy!
That's what I thought too, and then I found myself on the wrong end of a Traptanium longsword.

OMG, this is totally like one of those nightmares where you show up to class in your underwear! Well, I've never had one of those nightmares -- I can control dreams, of course I don't have nightmares!
Would you like them better if they were smaller, ~player~? Or maybe if I didn't have any breasts at all? Ask nicely enough and maybe I'll arrange that...
They're not too small for you, are they, Portal Master? I thought I'd be modest and give myself an average-sized chest, but maybe you like bigger chests more?
Do you dream of feet often, ~player~? I totally don't even need to tell you what that means...
Do you like getting stepped on, ~player~? I can arrange bigger feet for you, if you want...
I don't even need shoes anyway! I can float!
That's a bit better, but I could totally stand to take more off, don't you think?
Why yes, I did color-coordinate my whole outfit around my bow. Thanks for noticing!
That was my last line of defense, BTW. If I lose again, this dream is going to get a little sweeter.
How often do you see boobs like these in your dreams, ~player~? Have you ever touched them?
What do you think, Portal Master? Are they boobs worth spilling secrets over? Or maybe... spilling something else?
So, what do you think? Am I everything you dreamed I would be?
Would you believe me if I said this is how I normally dress? Well it is~...
Aren't I just totally dreamy?
Win or lose, I just hope I get to put my body to use soon~!
Win or lose, I just hope I get to put my body to use soon~!
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
So Ms. Evil Genius, what kind of evil creations have you invented? I'm willing to bet you've created some form of minion to do your bidding with, am I right?
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
A tie? Wwwhatever.
What an evil choice! ~player~ oughta send a Trap Master after you! Aha ha!
Great choice -- that's the villain in me talking, BTW, not the horny girl!
Hey! Making people want to sleep is my job! Ahaha!
Sure would be a shame if a certain Air element girl summoned a tornado to blow all of your clothes off...
Everyone still awake after that? Good! 'Cause if you do fall asleep, I'm totally not waking you!
Even without showing skin, you're revealing so much about yourself! Like your attitude towards others!
OMG!
What an evil choice! ~player~ oughta send a Trap Master after you! Aha ha!
Great choice -- that's the villain in me talking, BTW, not the horny girl!
Hey! Making people want to sleep is my job! Ahaha!
Guess I'm not the only one here who isn't quite what she appears to be!
Sure would be a shame if a certain Air element girl summoned a tornado to blow all of your clothes off...
Everyone still awake after that? Good! 'Cause if you do fall asleep, I'm totally not waking you!
Even without showing skin, you're revealing so much about yourself! Like your attitude towards others!
Hey, I think I saw an Imaginator wearing something just like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~! Do you think you were in mind when their creator imagined them up?
Did you get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ with your latest upgrade or something? I love when that happens!
It's just like you're losing an upgrade, like you're being reset by a Portal Master. Have you ever had that happen? It's a totally weird feeling!
I could totally see ~clothing.ifPlural(those popping out of a chunk of Imaginite, but they look|that popping out of a chunk of Imaginite, but it looks)~ better popping off of you!
The less you wear, the better you sleep. That's just, like, common knowledge!
Could you imagine if getting an upgrade made you wear less clothes sometimes? That'd be totally weird!
Okay, but why do you wanna fly? I can float, so it's, like, no biggie to me.
Yeah! I mean, it's pretty messy, but it totally goes with your look! What kind of products do you use?
Don't tell me you just misplaced them, I've heard that one before!
Okay, you got me there, but what have you made?
Hey, I think I saw an Imaginator wearing something just like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~! Do you think you were in mind when their creator imagined them up?
Did you get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ with your latest upgrade or something? I love when that happens!
It's just like you're losing an upgrade, like you're being reset by a Portal Master. Have you ever had that happen? It's a totally weird feeling!
What kind of wings do you want, anyway? A metalheaed like you probably wants bat wings, right?
You should let me try some stuff on your hair sometime. I know my way around a head of hair, I bet I could get your hair under control!
OMG, that's a lot more evil than forgetting where you put them!
Ooh, that sounds like a fun weapon! What's it do?
Fine then, don't tell me. I'll just search your thoughts for that story!
I could totally see ~clothing.ifPlural(those popping out of a chunk of Imaginite, but they look|that popping out of a chunk of Imaginite, but it looks)~ better popping off of you!
The less you wear, the better you sleep. That's just, like, common knowledge!
Could you imagine if getting an upgrade made you wear less clothes sometimes? That'd be totally weird!
OMG, you're about to have one of those dreams where you forgot to put on your ~clothing~ before leaving home! Aha ha!
You might be surprised how comfortable you'll feel without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. The body is actually, like, pretty good at keeping your temperature right, especially while you sleep!
I'd be totally okay with you switching ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ out for a blanket if you want!
Pajamas are overrated. The less you wear to bed, the better!
You're gonna sleep better with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, trust me.
You can tell a lot about a person by the what they do with their ~clothing~ when they're getting ready for bed.
OMG, you're about to have one of those dreams where you forgot to put on your ~clothing~ before leaving home! Aha ha!
You might be surprised how comfortable you'll feel without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. The body is actually, like, pretty good at keeping your temperature right, especially while you sleep!
I'd be totally okay with you switching ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ out for a blanket if you want!
Pajamas are overrated. The less you wear to bed, the better!
You're gonna sleep better with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, trust me.
You can tell a lot about a person by the what they do with their ~clothing~ when they're getting ready for bed.
I love a guy who sleeps topless!
~clothing.ifPlural(Ooh, take them off slowly for me. I love when guys take them off slowly.|Ooh, take it off slowly for me. I love when guys take it off slowly.)~
What girl doesn't dream of getting every guy she meets topless?
Ooh, you're about to go into Super ~name~ mode! Hopefully your Super mode won't involve any barrels!
Now there's a chest a girl can fall asleep on.
It's too bad most of the topless Skylanders don't have, like, human chests!
At least we know your chest isn't a Chomp Chest, 'cause it totally doesn't bite!
OMG, you don't have just any chest, you totally have a Gatling Chest! Ahaha!
It's already, like, super obvious you don't have much going on down there, but I hope you'll prove me wrong!
Too bad I already read your mind to find out your penis size. Well that, and I can also, y'know, see how little you fill out your ~clothing~!
Ooh, is it time for us to meet Spike McPokerton?
"Spike's coming, so watch out for pokey stuff!" Aha ha, I still can't believe he thinks that catchphrase is famous!
That bulge you've got going on is nice, but seeing what's under there with my own, glowy eyes would be a whole lot nicer!
Oh, you're not going to keep ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on? Wouldn't have been the first time I watched a guy cum with his clothes on.
I hope you weren't expecting me to mock your size, Portal Master. You're beautiful just the way you are!
Are these the kinds of guys you're into, ~player~, or did someone put you up to this?
This reminds me of that time the Skylanders got shrunk down to the size of bugs! Except no collector in their right mind would wanna keep that little thing!
Well, you know what they say: "Dream big." In your case, dream much, much bigger!
It's actually kinda sad that my teeth are nicer than your dick -- and in case you didn't notice, I'm wearing braces.
Hex isn't the only one who can raise a wall of bones, you know...
The Gulper isn't the only ex Doom Raider who likes to swallow things~...
Have you ever had a blowjob from a girl with braces before? There's, like, no way it's not just as good as one from a girl with better teeth.
I sure would like to see your morning wood. And maybe play with it a little, too~.
OMG. I guess the power to use Portals isn't the only gift you were born with...
You weren't sent here to trick me into going back to Cloudcracker Prison, were you? Because if you were, that plan is totally working~...
I want to suck on that more than I want to suck on those lollipops Pain-Yatta fights with. Unlike those, though, that will actually fit in my mouth...
I am definitely showing up in your next wet dream.
OMG, your morning wood must be more like a morning tree!
I hope crystals aren't the only thing you smash with that Traptanium greatsword of yours~!
You probably wouldn't be too comfortable sleeping with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on, anyway!
Ooh, the best part about getting ready for bed! Taking off your ~clothing~!
It's too bad there aren't more girls who sleep topless -- especially with a baggy pajama bottom, that's such a good look.
I wouldn't even nap with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on, let alone a full night's sleep, so good riddance!
They're like two cute little Chompies!... Ugh, I've been spending too much time around Chompy Mage...
Your pillow potential is pretty low, but your snugglability is, like, not even in question!
You might be surprised at how often I see people dreaming of small chests like yours!
I'm imagining you sleeping naked, all bundled up in blankets. So cute!
I'm sure those make lovely pillows!
Doesn't it just feel so good to sleep with your breasts let loose?
Don't you just love the feeling of a blanket against your bare chest when you're lying in bed?
How often do you sleep on your chest? Can I sleep on your chest sometime?
Who wouldn't want to take a nap on those big, fluffy pillows?
Gosh, I think you might even be bustier than Ninjini -- and she's a Giant!
OMG, you totally need a boob pillow, if you don't already have one!
Aren't you just a dream come true!
Hey, have you ever slept in nothing but an oversized t-shirt? It's a totally cute look!
Y'know, the difference between sleeping in nothing but ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ and sleeping totally naked is, like, nothing.
There's, like, no way what you've got going on down there isn't totally dreamy!
Ooh, be sure to give us a good look at that Portal of Power of yours!
Forget Skystones, I wanna smash that.
Have you ever thought being with a girl with a dick before? Guess who's here that can make that happen~?
Sleeping without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ looks and feels totally better, anyway!
I know someone who'll still be thinking about that when they go to sleep tonight. Isn't that right, Portal Master?
Er, wait, Bowser? OMG, is that really you? Or are you, like, his sister or something?
So what's with this fascination with wings you have? You know they have, like, jetpacks and stuff, right?
Who does your hair? It's so floofy!
Is this talking butterfly part of some kind of weird kink of yours, Portal Master?
Is this your car, Portal Master? And it's playing? If I wanted to play strip poker with a vehicle, I'd have invited Drill Sergeant.
Oh good, you're changing the song again!
C'mon, play something good!
Is this car even able to play good music? Or was it, like, cursed to only play cheesy songs?
Hey, I bet Chill Bill's radio show is on right now! We could listen to that instead!
So you can get your car to play strip poker, but you can't get it to play something we all can like?
Does this car have a Rift Engine in it, ~player~? Maybe you can use it to drive to a world where this music is in style!
If you want to get me into the back seat of that car, you're going to have to set the radio to something a lot sexier than this!
What now, you dumb hunk of metal? Your radio broke!
In the Skylanders Academy, this is where you'd shout a catchphrase, but you can, like, skip that part if you want.
Ooh, your first move! If this were Skystones Smash, what you do here would be important!
You weren't planning on sleeping through this match, were you?
There's, like, no way you can sleep comfortably dressed like that! The less, the better!
Dreams do come true! Just not ~name~'s!
Time for you to do some day-dreaming, ~name~!
Time to see how DTF you really are, ~name~!
Ooh, looks like you're SOL, ~name~! At least as far as "winning" goes!
Your move, Skylan-- er, ~name~!
Ooh, it's the Portal Master's turn! Let's see what you got!
No summoning clothes on us, now! You're only allowed to take off what you started with!
Even if you're not Air element, you can still blow us away! Ahaha!
Wake up, ~name~! It's totally your turn!
Lets see you make some dreams come true!
I may be able to make things appear, but getting your clothes to disappear is all up to you!
Let's see you get a little more sleep-ready!
You're not just sleepwalking through this match, are you? Aha ha!
Don't worry about losing, ~name~. This is all just a dream, anyway! Or is it...?
I was totally hoping it'd be you next, ~name~!
Well, whatever. You can make it up to me later, Portal Master.
Ugh, this isn't any better!
Ugh, again? I am so getting you back for this, ~player~!
Try again, you stupid car!
Who names these songs, anyway?
"Space Boy?" What is that, Astroblast's theme song?
Do you think Traptanium can trap cars? I hope it can...
OMG, yes! The radio stopped working!
A good place to start would be changing the radio again. Don't you have anything better to play, like maybe some Skaletones?
If this is all you listen to, you totally need to update your music library!
I may not know your fears, but once you see enough nightmares, you get pretty good at guessing!
I would legit rather be listening to Wolfgang's brother sing generic lounge music right now!
OMG, what an appropriate song! No! No I don't like your car! It's out of style and has a broken radio!
Ugh, this car is legit giving me a headache...
Well, even if it can't, it can still chop it up into little pieces! I'd be okay with that too!
I can finally hear myself think again! I can hear you thinking again too! I feel better than when we kicked Kaos out of the Doom Raiders!
Good riddance! I'd rather drive around in Pandergast's Clunker than that shoebox!
Feel free to say your fantasies out loud. I totally won't judge!
Maybe later I can make whatever you fantasize during this come true!
If I catch anyone dreaming of your performance later, I'll be sure to let you know!
If you don't feel like using your imagination, I can let you borrow some of mine~.
Ugh, that car's still here?
You're not controlling that car, are you, Portal Master? You'd better get it to stop, it's gonna hurt someone!
If that car doesn't get out of here soon, I am so going to overinflate it's tires!
Tell me, what kind of sex dreams do you have, ~name~? I could make them come true~!
If you could have wet dreams every night, would you? I could arrange that for you~.
Do you ever have dreams where your masturbating? It totally doesn't mean what you'd think!
That's it, ~name~, stroke for me. Stroke yourself like it's a lazy, horny morning...
My hands are totally free if you need them -- and I can conjure more, too!
You're so good at that, you could, like, become a Masturbation-class Sensei! Ahaha!
If you handle a Traptanium weapon as well as you're handling yourself, I'd be back in Cloudcracker in, like, no time!
Persephone didn't enchant your masturbation abilities, did she? 'Cause you're, like, almost too much to handle. If she did, I'll totally have to get her back for that!
The great thing about being able to read you mind is I know exactly how into me you are right now!
Ugh, finally! You so owe me for putting me through that, ~player~!
Wow, I just helped a Portal Master cum! Don't I just feel like the prettiest girl in the world right now!
Better than cumming in your sleep, right? Well, maybe you just haven't had a good enough wet dream~.
If you wanna just fall asleep now, I'm totally okay with that!
Orgasms are totally the best sleep aid, don't you think?
I guarantee if you have a wet dream with me in it, it'll be way better than what you just felt!
I guess you're officially Water element now! Ahaha!
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
You may know your needs well, but I bet I can do way more for you than you can do for yourself!
If you want some head from me, you might get more than you bargained for~...
Better than cumming in your sleep, right? Well, maybe you just haven't had a good enough wet dream~.
If you wanna just fall asleep now, I'm totally okay with that!
Orgasms are totally the best sleep aid, don't you think?
I guarantee if you have a wet dream with me in it, it'll be way better than what you just felt!
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
Looks like you broke something, Portal Master. This line shouldn't be playing! I guess you're just too powerful for this game!
You may know your needs well, but I bet I can do way more for you than you can do for yourself!
Better than cumming in your sleep, right? Well, maybe you just haven't had a good enough wet dream~.
If you wanna just fall asleep now, I'm totally okay with that!
Orgasms are totally the best sleep aid, don't you think?
I guarantee if you have a wet dream with me in it, it'll be way better than what you just felt!
I don't mind losing. At least this time I won't get sucked into a Traptanium Crystal!
I don't mind losing. At least this time I won't get sucked into a Traptanium Crystal!
No one minds if I do a bit of "dreaming," right?
I'm sure you're, like, totally jealous of my powers now that you've seen me do this. I can't give you my powers, but I can totally share them.
Oh yeah, just like that... Mmm...
BTW, just because I can do this doesn't mean I don't still want some real action.
No one masturbates better than us Dream Realm beings.
You can't tell me you don't wanna be a part of this~...
Have you ever had a dream like this, Portal Master? Maybe I'll give you one tonight...
Mmm... These hands are so good~...
I bet you won't be able to look at me the same now that you've seen me to this.
It feels so good to be naughty~...
OMG... I'm so close...
Yes... Yes~...
Get a good look while you can... I'm getting close...
My wet dream... is almost over...
That's it... Right there... Yes... Yes~...
Oh... Em... Geeeeeeeeeee...!
OMG... I'm just... gonna float here for a bit longer...
If I fall asleep, don't draw anything on my face. I'll totally get you back for it!
Have you ever had, like, a really good orgasm and afterward you feel like you're floating? You should try literally floating after one sometime!
Aside from the mess, this is my every day right here: floating around, naked, taunting others. Sound like a good time, right?
I could totally go for some of Pain-Yatta's candy right now. Too bad he's not here right now so I can pester him for some!
Isn't it funny how your bed becomes, like, twice as comfy after a good orgasm?
I love a good wet dream, but it's too bad you don't get time to bask in the afterglow, y'know?
BTW, it's totally okay to have sex with someone in your dreams. It's, like, not even the real them, so it doesn't even count. It's like how you can die in a dream and not die for real, y'know?
So you're totally gonna dream about me tonight, right? Well, maybe I'll just show up anyway...
Ahaha! If my last encounter with a Portal Master went this well, the Doom Raiders would've taken over Skylands!
OMG, the game ended before you could see me naked! Maybe you will next time... in your dreams! Or maybe not even then!
Aw, too bad, you lost before I could -- OMG, what's happening to my clothes? Oh well!
I feel bad that you all lost before I could get totally naked, so here. Enjoy~!
Say hi to Crash for me, Cortex!
Enjoy your win, ~name~! I totally won't be eating your dreams tonight!

scene.name: Main
scene.directive: Hey, this is BlueKoin here. Epilogues are hard, so here's just a bunch of naked Skylanders models I made.
From left to right: Stealth Elf.
This epilogue is, like, so lame, right?
To punish BlueKoin, how about I spill some of his secrets?
Well, he still sleeps with a night light.
He still has nightmares about the robots from Five Nights at Freddy's.
And he has a small doll collection stashed in his room -- you don't want to know what he does with them sometimes!
This is all true, BTW! Just ask him yourself!
Anyway, I gotta go, so I'll TTYL. Bye! Thanks for playing with me!
